channel.title: Getting XP From CLicking Objects
channel.description: [right]Can Someone tell me how to ChangeThe Home And Getting XP From CLicking Objects on this server coz its diffrent from all tut's Thanks you .. LINK = [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431823.0.html.]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431823.0.html.[/url]

item.title: Getting XP From CLicking Objects
item.dc:creator: @TheLastViking TheLastViking
item.description:
@TheLastViking wrote:

[quote=“TheLastViking, post:6, topic:336199”]ase 252: // atObject2
objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); //5292 bankwindow
objectY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
objectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

                            if(objectID == 6912) { // Xerozcheez: This object requires to be 3 sqs minium, so we change it ;)
                            destinationRange = 3;
                            } 
                            else {
                            destinationRange = 2;
                            }

                            if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {
                            viewTo(objectX, objectY);
                            objectClick2(objectID, objectX, objectY);
                            }
                            else {
                            ActionType = 2;
                            destinationX = objectX;
                            destinationY = objectY;
                            destinationID = objectID;
                            WalkingTo = true;
                            }

if(objectID == ){if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){actionInterval = 1000;lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();addSkillXP(***, **);setAnimation(881);}}}
That it??[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Getting XP From CLicking Objects
item.dc:creator: @TheLastViking TheLastViking
item.description:
@TheLastViking wrote:

ase 252: // atObject2
objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); //5292 bankwindow
objectY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
objectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

                            if(objectID == 6912) { // Xerozcheez: This object requires to be 3 sqs minium, so we change it ;)
                            destinationRange = 3;
                            } 
                            else {
                            destinationRange = 2;
                            }

                            if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {
                            viewTo(objectX, objectY);
                            objectClick2(objectID, objectX, objectY);
                            }
                            else {
                            ActionType = 2;
                            destinationX = objectX;
                            destinationY = objectY;
                            destinationID = objectID;
                            WalkingTo = true;
                            }

THATS WHAT I GOT IN CASE 252 WHERE DO I PUT IT… THANKS =)

Read full topic

item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Put that code in case 252: in client.java (server side).

Ok, i can change the home now but thanks anyway i dont know wheere to put that code and cooos im using a complete blank source there isnt any makegGlobalObject… But in the Server(source) folder there is a file called make globall object…Download it and see what u think… \thanks

item.title: Getting XP From CLicking Objects
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Well if you whant to change the home you will need to make big changes… like moving the npc , change the location after you die , teleports etc.
But i can help you with Xp from clicking objects.

if(objectID == ****){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 1000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(*******, **); setAnimation(881); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Getting XP From CLicking Objects
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Search in client.java the object id you are trying to change. Next to the object id should be the xp amount
